page.title: 16FIGHTING CRIME IN LOCKWOOD
page.content: According to the{police}most crimes are{committed}during the night. In {Lockwood}few crimes were committed in {1984.}There was a{small number}of {break-in's}which were mainly{confined to{local businesses. Video recorders, {computers, jewellery}and{money}are things which burglars take{most often. There have been a couple of{house- {robberies}where the{thieves}have entered the house by{breaking a {window. The{criminals}are usually{detected}and {charged}by the{police.}A person may join the{police force}at the age of {18\. Policemen}must be{5 feet 8 inches to join the force.{Policewomen}must be {5 feet 5\ inches}tall. They must also have{qualities}such as good{eye-sight and{hearing.
